Command.SQL: select distinct schema from (select creator as "SCHEMA" from sysibm.systables union all select schema from sysibm.sysdatatypes union all select schema from sysibm.sysroutines union all select schema from sysibm.systriggers union all select creator as "SCHEMA" from sysibm.syssynonyms union all select creator as "SCHEMA" from sysibm.sysviews ) a

select distinct schema from (select creator as "SCHEMA" from sysibm.systables union all select schema from sysibm.sysdatatypes union all select schema from sysibm.sysroutines union all select schema from sysibm.systriggers union all select creator as "SCHEMA" from sysibm.syssynonyms union all select creator as "SCHEMA" from sysibm.sysviews ) a
select * from sysibm.systables where creator = '${owner}' and name like '${table}' and type like '${type}'
select * from sysibm.syscolumns where tbcreator = '${owner}' and tbname = '${table}' order by colno

select distinct v.creator, v.name, v.check from sysibm.sysviews v join sysibm.systables t on v.creator = t.creator and v.name = t.name where t.type = '${type}' and v.creator = '${owner}' and v.name like '${view}' order by 1, 2, 3

select
statement
text
from sysibm.sysviews where creator = '${owner}' and name = '${view}' order by seqno
select * from sysibm.systriggers where tbowner = '${tbowner}' and tbname like '${table}' and schema like '${triggerSchema}' order by schema, name, seqno
select * from sysibm.systriggers where tbowner = '${tbowner}' or schema = '${triggerSchema}' order by schema, name, seqno

select
text
CAST(statement as varchar(30000))
from sysibm.systriggers where schema = '${owner}' and name = '${name}' order by schema, name, seqno
Select * from SYSIBM.SYSCHECKS c where c.TBOWNER = '${tbowner}' AND c.tbname = '${table}';
select * from sysibm.sysindexes where (TBCREATOR = '${tableCreator}' OR CREATOR = '${indexCreator}' ) ${xtraCond}
select * from sysibm.syskeys where ixcreator = '${indexCreator}' and ixname = '${name}' order by ixname, colseq
select * from sysibm.systables where creator = '${owner}' order by creator, name
select * from sysibm.syspackage where creator = '${owner}' order by collid, name
select * from sysibm.sysroutines where routinetype = 'F' and schema = '${owner}' order by schema, name
select * from sysibm.sysparms where schema = '${owner}' and name = '${function}' and specificname = '${specificname}' and routinetype = 'F' and rowtype in (${rowtype}) order by specificname, ordinal
select * from sysibm.sysroutines where routinetype = 'P' and schema = '${owner}' order by schema, name
select * from sysibm.sysparms where schema = '${owner}' and name = '${procedure}' and specificname = '${specificname}' and routinetype = 'P' order by specificname, ordinal
select * from sysibm.syssequences where schema = '${owner}' and seqtype = 'S' order by name
select * from sysibm.syssequenceauth where name = '${name}' and schema = '${owner}'
select * from sysibm.sysuserauth where granteetype = '${granteetype}' and grantee like '${grantee}'
select * from sysibm.systablespace order by name
select * from sysibm.sysdatabase order by name
select * from sysibm.sysstogroup order by name
select * from sysibm.syssynonyms where creator = '${owner}' order by name
select * from sysibm.syssynonyms where creator = '${owner}' AND name = '${objectname}'

Action.label: Empty Table
Action.Confirm: Really remove all rows in table ${schema}.${objectname}?
Action.Result: All rows in table ${schema}.${objectname} has been removed!

Input.name: source
Input.Default: -- -- Insert your own trigger code here -- insert into anotherTable (col1, col2) values(val1, val2)

Command.SQL: select remarks from SYSIBM.SYSCOLUMNS where TBCREATOR = '${schema}' and TBNAME = '${theTableName}' and NAME = '${objectname}'
select remarks from sysibm.systables where TYPE = 'V' and CREATOR = '${schema}' and NAME = '${objectname}'
select name from sysibm.systables where creator = '${sourceschema}' and type in ('T', 'V') order by name
select remarks from sysibm.systables where TYPE = 'A' and CREATOR = '${schema}' and NAME = '${objectname}'
select name from sysibm.systables where creator = '${sourceschema}' and type in ('T', 'V') order by name
select remarks from sysibm.sysindexes where CREATOR = '${indexCreator}' and NAME = '${objectname}'
create sequence "${schema}".${QB}${sequenceName}${QE} as ${dataType} start with ${startWith} increment by ${increment} ${_minValue} ${_maxValue} ${cycle} cache ${cache} ${order}
select remarks from sysibm.syssequences where SEQTYPE = 'S' and SCHEMA = '${schema}' and NAME = '${objectname}'

Action.label: Drop Materialized Query Table
Action.Result: Materialized query table ${schema}.${objectname} has been dropped!

Command.SQL: select remarks from sysibm.systables where TYPE = 'M' and CREATOR = '${schema}' and NAME = '${objectname}'

Action.label: Refresh Materialized Query Table
Action.Result: Materialized query table ${schema}.${objectname} has been refreshed!

Command.SQL: select DBNAME from sysibm.systablespace where NAME = '${objectname}'

Input.label: VCAT/STOGROUP
Input.name: zos_tablespace_using_name
Input.tip: Select to change to USING VCAT/ or USING STOGROUP

Input.label: PRIQTY
Input.name: zos_tablespace_priqty_name
Input.tip: In KB , -1 means automatic space allocation

SetVar.name: zos_tablespace_priqty_clause
SetVar.value: #zos_tablespace_priqty_name neq "Do not change defined value" ? (#zos_tablespace_priqty_name eq "" ? "" : " PRIQTY "+#zos_tablespace_priqty_name) : ""

Input.label: SECQTY
Input.name: zos_tablespace_secqty_name
Input.tip: In KB , -1 means automatic space allocation

SetVar.name: zos_tablespace_secqty_clause
SetVar.value: #zos_tablespace_secqty_name neq "Do not change defined value" ? (#zos_tablespace_secqty_name eq "" ? "" : " SECQTY "+#zos_tablespace_secqty_name) : ""

SetVar.name: zos_tablespace_erase_clause
SetVar.value: (#zos_tablespace_erase_name eq "DONT_CHANGE") ? "" : ((#zos_tablespace_erase_name eq "Y") ? " ERASE YES " : " ERASE NO ")

SetVar.name: zos_tablespace_freepage_clause
SetVar.value: #zos_tablespace_freepage_name neq "Do not change defined value" ? " FREEPAGE "+#zos_tablespace_freepage_name : ""

SetVar.name: zos_tablespace_pctfree_clause
SetVar.value: #zos_tablespace_pctfree_name neq "Do not change defined value" ? " PCTFREE "+#zos_tablespace_pctfree_name : ""

SetVar.name: zos_tablespace_gbpcache_clause
SetVar.value: #zos_tablespace_gbpcache_name eq "DONT_CHANGE" ? "" : (#zos_tablespace_gbpcache_name eq "" ? " GBPCACHE CHANGED " : (#zos_tablespace_gbpcache_name eq "N" ? " GBPCACHE NONE " : (#zos_tablespace_gbpcache_name eq "S" ? " GBPCACHE SYSTEM " : (#zos_tablespace_gbpcache_name eq "A" ? " GBPCACHE ALL " : ""))))

SetVar.name: zos_tablespace_compress_clause
SetVar.value: #zos_tablespace_compress_name neq "DONT_CHANGE" ? (#zos_tablespace_compress_name eq "" ? " COMPRESS NO " : " COMPRESS YES ") : ""

SetVar.name: zos_tablespace_trackmod_clause
SetVar.value: #zos_tablespace_trackmod_name neq "DONT_CHANGE" ? (#zos_tablespace_trackmod_name eq "N" ? " TRACKMOD NO " : " TRACKMOD YES ") : ""

SetVar.name: zos_tablespace_bufferpool_clause
SetVar.value: #zos_tablespace_bufferpool_name.equals("Do not change defined value") ? "" : (#zos_tablespace_bufferpool_name eq "" ? "" : " BUFFERPOOL "+#zos_tablespace_bufferpool_name)

SetVar.name: zos_tablespace_locksize_clause
SetVar.value: #zos_tablespace_locksize_name.equals("Do not change defined value") ? "" : (#zos_tablespace_locksize_name eq "" ? "" : (#zos_tablespace_locksize_name eq "A" ? " LOCKSIZE ANY " : (#zos_tablespace_locksize_name eq "L" ? " LOCKSIZE LOB " : (#zos_tablespace_locksize_name eq "P" ? " LOCKSIZE PAGE " : (#zos_tablespace_locksize_name eq "R" ? " LOCKSIZE ROW " : (#zos_tablespace_locksize_name eq "S" ? " LOCKSIZE TABLESPACE " : (#zos_tablespace_locksize_name eq "T" ? " LOCKSIZE TABLE " : (#zos_tablespace_locksize_name eq "X" ? "" : ""))))))))

Input.label: Lockmax
Input.name: zos_tablespace_lockmax_name
Input.tip: -1 : SYSTEM -- 0 : escalation does not occur

SetVar.name: zos_tablespace_lockmax_clause
SetVar.value: #zos_tablespace_lockmax_name.equals("Do not change defined value") ? "" : (#zos_tablespace_lockmax_name eq "" ? "" : (#zos_tablespace_lockmax_name eq "-1" ? " LOCKMAX SYSTEM " : " LOCKMAX "+#zos_tablespace_lockmax_name))

SetVar.name: zos_tablespace_close_clause
SetVar.value: #zos_tablespace_close_name.equals("DONT_CHANGE") ? "" : (#zos_tablespace_close_name eq "" ? "" : (#zos_tablespace_close_name eq "Y" ? " CLOSE YES " : " CLOSE NO "))

Input.label: CCSID
Input.name: zos_tablespace_ccsid_value
Input.tip: Note that only certain transitions are allowed.

Input.label: MAXROWS
Input.name: zos_tablespace_maxrows_name
Input.tip: Enter 0~255 , For a LOB table space 0 indicates that the column is not applicable

SetVar.name: zos_tablespace_maxrows_clause
SetVar.value: #zos_tablespace_maxrows_name.equals("Do not change defined value") ? "" : (#zos_tablespace_maxrows_name eq "" ? "" : " MAXROWS "+#zos_tablespace_maxrows_name)

Input.label: MAXPARTITIONS
Input.name: zos_tablespace_maxpartitions_name
Input.tip: 0 means NON-PARTITIONED tablespace

SetVar.name: zos_tablespace_maxpartitions_clause
SetVar.value: #zos_tablespace_maxpartitions_name.equals("Do not change defined value") ? "" : (#zos_tablespace_maxpartitions_name eq "" ? "" : " MAXPARTITION "+#zos_tablespace_maxpartitions_name)

Input.label: VCAT Name
Input.name: zosvcatname
Input.tip: Fill only if you selected VCAT option otherwise you can leave it blank.

Input.label: Space allocation
Input.tip: Values In KB , -1 means automatic space allocation

Input.label: PRIQTY
Input.name: zos_tablespace_priqty_name
Input.tip: In KB , -1 means automatic space allocation. Blank = Use default, PRIQTY parameter not included

Input.label: SECQTY
Input.name: zos_tablespace_secqty_name
Input.tip: In KB , -1 means automatic space allocation Blank = Use default, SECQTY parameter not included

Input.label: PCTFREE
Input.name: zos_tablespace_pctfree_name
Input.tip: Percentage of each page to leave as free space when the table is loaded or reorganized

Input.label: TRACKMOD
Input.name: zos_tablespace_trackmod_name
Input.tip: Track modified pages

Input.label: Close
Input.name: zos_tablespace_close_name
Input.tip: Specifies the priority in which data sets are closed

Input.label: MAXROWS
Input.name: zos_tablespace_maxrows_name
Input.tip: Enter 0~255

Command.SQL: select VOLID from sysibm.sysvolumes where SGNAME = '${objectname}'

SetVar.name: zos_database_asworkfile_clause
SetVar.value: ((#zos_database_asworkfile_name eq "selected") ? ((#zos_database_membername_clause eq "") ? " AS WORKFILE " : (" AS WORKFILE FOR "+#zos_database_membername_clause)) : "")

DataNode.label: ${getColumnDefinitions.COLUMN_NAME}
DataNode.tip: #dataMap.get('getColumnDefinitions.IS_PRIMARY_KEY') eq true ? 'This is a primary key column' : ''

DataNode.label: ${getColumnDefinitions.COLUMN_NAME}
DataNode.tip: #dataMap.get('getColumnDefinitions.IS_PRIMARY_KEY') eq true ? 'This is a primary key column' : ''
